name: Fire Emblem: Sword of Heaven and Earth
summary:
Fire Emblem: Sword of Heaven and Earth is a ROM Hack of Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade created by 38%. An English translation was created by Nasaelo.

War looms over Elibe once again. Zephiel, King of Bern was the one who started the trigger, but thanks to the efforts of Roy, Prince of Pherae, his plan never came to fruition. Before these events, Saya, daughter of Chief Lyndis, prepares for what will be her last training. Embark with Saya on the other side of the coin of the events of this ruthless and cold war.
